name: Kill 280 heroes
description:
This game was made for Magara Jam #5

I mean I probably shouldn't even upload this but i spent my hours on it and became sleepless so nothing to do about it. But the project is not wasted, I have learned a lot
(also game has no sounds because i gave up)

Controls*WASD - Movement
*CTRL - crouch (sometimes player gets stuck on the ground, use crouch to unstuck)
*Q - primary skill
*E - secondary skill
*V - change skill class

Assets;
all made by me; models, scripts, textures, animations, effects

Summary

There is 280 heroes in a open field including wizards, archers, giants, knights. And you need to kill them all to beat the game (at least this wass the intention)
